entity.name: Celtic - Aengus √ìg
entity.subtitle: God of Love, Youth, and Poetic Inspiration
entity.description: The Young Son, born of a love affair between the Dagda and the river goddess Boann. Aengus embodies romantic love, youth that never fades, dreams and visions, and the sweet magic of poetry and music. He is perpetually young and beautiful, surrounded by birds that are kisses transformed, and his harp music can enchant any heart.

relationships.allies: All theTuatha D√© Danann, lovers everywhere, poets and musicians, those who dream true dreams
relationships.enemies: Those who would separate true lovers; Fionn mac Cumhaill (as pursuer of Diarmuid and Gr√°inne); anyone who acts against love

family.parents: TheDagda(father, chief of the Tuatha D√© Danann) and Boann (mother, goddess of the River Boyne)
family.consorts: Caer Ibormeith (the swan maiden, his dream-love and eternal companion)
family.siblings: Brigid(sister, goddess of fire and poetry), Bodb Derg, Midir (half-brothers through theDagda), numerous other siblings

archetype.name: üíï LOVE GOD / ETERNAL YOUTH
archetype.description: Aengus embodies the Love God archetype - divine beauty, romantic passion, and the transformative power of love.
